isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 1: ENGINE CONTROL SYSTEM OVERVIEW - SECTION 1.8: VEHICLE FEATURES - STANDARD FEATURES - SERVICE DIAGNOSTICS

svcproc.title: SERVICE DIAGNOSTICS
svcproc.para: The electronic service tool provides means for obtaining diagnostic information using the ATA data link. The recommended electronic service tool is the Pro-Link® 9000 with an International® cartridge. Sensor, actuator, electronic component and engine system faults can be detected by the ECM and be diagnosed by the EST.
The engine control system also provides service diagnostic information via flash codes emitted using the engine warning lamp. The service literature is indexed according to the flash codes.
